MAN.TITLE: rref
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: computes matrix row echelon form by lu transformations

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : m x n matrix with scalar entries
: m x n matrix,row echelon form of a

DESCRIPTION.P: rref computes the row echelon form of the given matrix by left lu decomposition. If ones need the transformation used just call X=rref([A,eye(m,m)]) the row echelon form R is X(:,1:n) and the left transformation L is given by X(:,n+1:n+m) such as L*A=R
